title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounting, Business Management, Government and Geography.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any other two (2) other subjects.

For NBC holders, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Secretarial Duties.?
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus any Social Science subject.

title: ADULT EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level   passes.

(ii)           NCE merit in two (2) subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and three (3) of Literature in English, History, French, Yoruba, Igbo, Hausa, Christian Religious Studies, Islamic Studies, Geography/Physic, Economics and Government or TC II with pass in English Language and four (4) other subjects.
subjects: Government/History, one (1) Social Science subject and any other subject.

title: AGRIC EXTENSION SERVICES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or equivalents in Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Botany/Zoology/Economics/Mathematics/Physics/Geography/Geology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes  in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science plus one of Physics, Geography and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology /Agriculture and Physics or Mathematics

title: AGRICULTURAL & BIORESOURCES ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or equivalent in Physics and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any from Introduction to Agricultural Science, Materials and Workshop Process and Machining, Tractor Layout Power Unit Under Carriage and Auto Electricity; Transmission System; Implement and Machine; Principles of Crop Husbandry and Land Use, Materials and Workshop Processes; Construction and Maintenance of Agricultural Machines; general Metal Work; General Wood Work and Building/Engineering Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one of Zoology/Botany/Agricultural Science/Biology, Geography, Mathematics, Physics, Geology, Economics and Health Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and one of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/ Agricultural Science and Mathematics or Physics.

title: AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE & EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) passes at 'A' Level in Biology /Zoology /Botany and any other Science subject.

(ii) NCE merit in Biology and any other Science subject.

(iii) NCE merit in Agriculture (Double Major).
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalents which must include English Language, Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science/Animal Husbandry/Fishery plus at least a pass in Chemistry in SSCE/GCE O-level/NECO/NABTEB or their equivalent.
subjects: Biology or Agriculture, Chemistry and any one of Physics, Economics, Geography, Mathematics, Government, Animal Husbandry, Fishery, Home Management, etc.

title: AGRICULTURE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and one from Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology/Mathematics (Pure & Applied).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and  any one of Mathematics, Physics, Geography and  Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and any one of Physics or Mathematics.

title: ANIMAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes or its equivalent in Chemistry and one of Biology/Botany/Zoology/Agriculture Science/Geography/Geology/Mathematics/Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology/Agric Science and one of Physics, Geography or Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Mathematics /Physics.

title: ARCHAEOLOGY
de_requirements:
A.  Archaeology and Heritage Studies


Two (2) papers at HSC or GCE A/Level, including a credit pass in English Language and a pass in Mathematics at WASC. Holders of Diploma or NCE recognized by the University of Nigeria also qualify for Direct Entry


B.  Tourism Studies

In addition to UNN minimum entry requirements; applicants shall have one of the following from recognized institutions;

i)  Credit level passes in ND in Hospitality Management or Hotel and Catering Management or Tourism

ii)  Credit level passes in HND in Hospitality Management or Hotel and Catering Management or Tourism
utme_requirements:
A.  Archaeology and Heritage Studies


In addition to UNN minimum entry requirements 

Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and any other Arts or Science subjects as SSCE or GCE O/Level or its equivalent;


B.  Tourism Studies

In addition to UNN minimum entry requirements;

Five (5)( credit passes including Mathematics, English Language, Geography/Tourism/Economics, and any of the core Arts, Social Science or Science subjects at not more than two sittings'
subjects: Any two (2) subjects from Arts, Social Sciences and one of History, Religious Studies, Government and Geography.

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: ART (COMBINED HONOURS)
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in the subjects to be combined
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and the subjects to be combined.
subjects: The subjects to be combined and one other subject.

title: B.A. (SINGLE & COMBINED HONS) IN MODERN LANGUAGES
de_requirements:
(i)              Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE French for French programme.

Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE in any subjects.
utme_requirements:
For programme A, five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language and French.

 

For Programme B, credit passes in English Language and four (4) other subjects.
subjects:
For Programme A,  French and any other two (2) subjects. 

For Programme B, any three (3)  subjects

title: BANKING & FINANCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics, plus any one (1) of Government and Geography.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE/ND/HND in related programmes plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGICAL SCIENCE(S)
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include one (1) of Botany, Zoology, Biology or Chemistry.

 

(ii)    ND/NCE in related programme/subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BOTANY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/Botany/Zoology and Chemistry or Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes or NCE merit in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Business Education Double Major.
utme_requirements: Credit passes in five subjects obtained at SSCE/NECO/NABTEB/GCE O-level which must include English Language, Mathematics and any of the following subjects: Economics, Commerce, Financial Accounting, Typewriting, Government, History, Geography
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) of the following: Commerce, Financial Accounting, Government, History, Geography, CRK

title: BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)	'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
(ii)	ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMPUTER EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i. Two (2)'A' Level passes or its equivalents in Physics and Mathematics.

ii. ND in Computer Science

iii.  NCE distinction credit or merit in Computer Education or Physics or Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5) O-level credit passes in English Language, Mathematics or Physics plus three Science or Social Science subjects obtained at SSCE/NECO/NABTEB/GCE
subjects: Mathematics, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science or Social Science subject

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)   Minimum of Credit level pass in Computer Science and Basic Physical  Sciences          of the University of Nigeria

 

(ii)   Minimum of Credit level pass in National Diploma in Computer Science from 

         recognized institutions



(iii)  Minimum of Credit level pass in National Diploma in Computer Science, with any          of the following combinations; Mathematics, Statistics or Physics

        from recognize institution



(iv)   Minimum of Credit level pass in any three of the following subjects' Computer, 

         Mathematics, Statistics and Physics in High School Certificate, A-level

          General Certificate in Education or combination of any two of the subjects in 

          National Certificate in Education
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two (2)  subjects from Chemistry, Biology, Agricultural Science, Economics, Further Mathematics, Computer Science, Data Processing and Information and Communication Technology at the SSCE, GCE, NECO O'Level or equivalent examinations in at most two sittings
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: COMPUTER WITH STATISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language , Mathematics and any three (3) of Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Further Maths,  and Technical  Drawing.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any one (1) of Chemistry, Economics and Biology.

title: CREATIVE ARTS
de_requirements:
(i)         Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts or Fine Arts and any other subject.

ND upper credit HND lower credit from recognised institutions.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Fine Arts.

For holders of NTC, the relevant subjects could be General Wood work, Building/Engineering Drawing, Introduction to Building Construction; Decorative Painting; Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design; Wall hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing; Printing Origination; Machine Printing and Finishing; General Metal Work, Basic Electricity, Spinning, Weaving, Surface Design and Printing; Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing; Graphic Design; Graphic

Printing and Ceramics.
subjects: Fine Arts and two (2) other Arts subjects or Social Science subjects.

title: CROP SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Botany/Zoology or Physics/Mathematics/Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics and one Science/Social Science subject and at least 'O' Level pass in Physics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agriculture and Mathematics or Physics.

title: DENTISTRY & DENTAL SURGERY
de_requirements: Three (3) 'A' Level passes to include Chemistry, Biology/Zoology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and one (1) other Science subject.

title: EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: NCE/'A' Level passes in Biology and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and one (1) other subject.
subjects: Biology and two (2) other subjects from Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics.

title: EDUCATION & CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level/NCE passes including Chemistry and one (1) other Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits in Mathematics, Chemistry, English Language and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) other subjects chosen from Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: EDUCATION & ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and one (1) other relevant subject.

(ii) NCE merit/credit in Economics and one (1) other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Economics and Mathematics.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and one (1) other subject from Geography/Physics, History, Government and Literature in English.

title: EDUCATION & ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION & FRENCH
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in French and one(1) other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and French.
subjects: French plus two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit which should include Geography

/Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Geography, English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Geography plus two (2) other Social Sciences/Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) NCE merit/'A' Level passes in History and one (1) other relevant Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, History and three (3) relevant Arts subjects.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Christian Religious Studies / Islamic Studies, Literature in English, French, Yoruba, Geography/Physics, Economics, Government and Hausa.

title: EDUCATION & IGBO
de_requirements: In addition to the University general admission requirement, candidates must have NCE or OND with at least merit pass in their art subjects’ combination plus Five (5) credits including English Language at O’level.
utme_requirements: In addition to the University general admission requirement, to be admitted into the programme by this mode, candidates must possess the West African School Certificate (WASC) or Senior Secondary School Certificate or the General Certificate of Education at ordinary level or their equivalent, with credit passes in at least five(5) subjects in not more than two sittings. One of these five subjects to be passed at credit level must be English Language and other arts subjects to be combined with education.
subjects: Igbo and two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION & INTEGRATED SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) NCE Integrated         Science

 

(ii)   NCE Science

       Education

 

(iii)  'A' Level         passes in two (2)Science subjects
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Biology, Chemistry, English Language and Mathematics
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology and Agricultural Science.

title: EDUCATION & MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes/NCE in Mathematics and one (1) Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics plus one (1) other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of the following Science subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: EDUCATION & MUSIC
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in Music.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Music and English Language.
subjects: Music and any other two (2) Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION & PHYSICS
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii) NCE credit/merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits passes to include English Language, Physics, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects or NTC/NBC.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics or Chemistry plus one (1) other subjects.

title: EDUCATION & POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects chosen from Government or History, Economics and Geography/Physics.

(ii) NCE merit in Government/History, Economics and Geography/Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalent to include English Language, Government/History and three (3) other subjects.
subjects: Government or History plus two (2) other Arts or Social Sciences subjects.

title: EDUCATION & SOCIAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)  NCE in two (2) relevant subjects.

(ii)Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or equivalent to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) Social Science subjects.

title: EDUCATION & SOCIAL STUDIES
de_requirements:
(i) NCE Social Studies from recognized Colleges.

(ii)           Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language plus two (2) Arts /Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Christian Religious Studies, Economics, Geography/Physics, Government, History and Islamic Studies.

title: EDUCATION AND RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes/NCE merit in Religious Studies and one (1) other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or TC II merit in five (5) subjects including English Language, Religious Studies and three (3) other Arts subjects.
subjects: Two (2) Arts subject including Religious studies and one (1) other subject.

title: EDUCATION ARTS
de_requirements: In addition to the University general admission requirement, to qualify for Direct Entry, candidates must have NCE or OND with at least merit pass in their art subjects’ combination plus Five (5) credits including English Language at O’level.
utme_requirements: In addition to the University general admission requirement to qualify to be admitted into the programme, candidates must possess the West African School Certificate (WASC) or Senior Secondary School Certificate or the General Certificate of Education at ordinary level or their equivalent, with credit passes in at least five(5) subjects in not more than two sittings. One of these five subjects to be passed at credit level must be English Language and other arts subjects to be combined with education.
subjects: Subject of specialization and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: EDUCATION FINE AND APPLIED ARTS
de_requirements:
(i)    NCE merit in Fine and Applied Arts Double Major.

(ii)'A' Level passes in Fine Arts and any other subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or TC II or NTC/NBC merit including Fine Art and English Language.
subjects: Fine Arts, one (1) other Arts subject and any other subject.

title: EDUCATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant Science subjects which should include candidates proposed course.

(ii)   NCE credit/merit in addition to TC II merit or 'O' Level credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Three (3) relevant Science or NBC subjects

title: ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)      'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics.

 ND/HND in Elect Eng. Upper/Lower credit respectively.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: ENGLISH & LITERARY STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Literature in English and English Language.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Mathematics, Economics, Geography, Biology and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one other subject

title: FINE ART/FINE & APPLIED ARTS
de_requirements:
(i)         Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Arts or Fine Arts and any other subject.

ND upper credit HND lower credit from recognised institutions.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language and Fine Arts.

For holders of NTC, the relevant subjects could be General Wood work, Building/Engineering Drawing, Introduction to Building Construction; Decorative Painting; Spray Painting, Lining, Sign and Design; Wall hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing; Printing Origination; Machine Printing and Finishing; General Metal Work, Basic Electricity, Spinning, Weaving, Surface Design and Printing; Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing; Graphic Design; Graphic

Printing and Ceramics.
subjects: Fine Arts and two (2) other Arts subjects or Social Science subjects.

title: FOOD SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology/Physics/Agric Science/Botany/Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Physics, Basic Catering and Food Services, Bakery and    Confectionaries, Hotel & Catering Crafty course (Cookery), Hotel & Catering Craft Course (Food /Drinks Services) and Basic Electricity.
subjects: Chemistry, Mathematics/ Physics and Biology/ Agricultural Science

title: FOOD SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)       'A' Level passes in two (2) of Physics Chemistry, and Mathematics.

(ii)     ND/HND upper credit in relevant programmes.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics or Biology.

title: FRENCH
de_requirements:
a,  Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE including French plus University Entry requirements. 

b.  DELF B1/B2, DALF and Baccalaureate certificates plus relevant entry requirement.

c.  Nigeria French Languages Diploma in French (Merit pass and above)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in not more than two sittings to include English Language and Literature in English, a science subject and any other two Arts subjects.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and any other two (2) subjects chosen from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: FRENCH WITH GERMAN / RUSSIAN
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including French and one other Arts subject.
utme_requirements:
A. FRENCH/GERMAN

B.  FRENCH/RUSSIA

a.  Five (5) SSCE credit passes in not more than two sittings to include English Language, Literature in English, French, a Science subject and any other subject chosen from Arts or Social Sciences

b.  UNN accepts DELF A2 certificate as "O" level credit pass in French or German.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English, French and any subject chosen from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: GEOGRAPHY
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes in Geography and any one of Economics., Government, History, Geology, Agricultural Science, Physics, Chemistry, Biology or Mathematics at HND, NCE, OND, HSC (Principal Level) or GCE (Advanced Level) or a minimum of merit in Diploma in Environmental Protection and Management (EPM) of the University of Nigeria, Nsukka in addition to a credit in English and Mathematics at SSCE or its equivalent
utme_requirements: A minimum of five (5) credits in English Language, Geography, Mathematics and any two (2) other subjects
subjects: Geography and two (2) other Arts or Social Science subjects

title: GEOLOGY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: GERMAN
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including the Foreign Language(s) where applicable.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include French, English Language and any three (3) other subjects.
subjects: French and any two (2) other Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: GUIDANCE & COUNSELLING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes or NCE in two (2) subjects plus the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level NTC/NBC credit passes or TC II merit including English Language with 'O' Level pass in Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: HEALTH EDUCATION
de_requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: HISTORY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in History and any other related subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include History and English Language.
subjects: History and any other two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: HOME ECONOMICS & EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    NCE merit in Home Economics

(ii) 'A' Level passes in two (2) of Chemistry or any Biology, Botany and Agricultural Science.

(iii) ND/HND credit in Home Economics or Food Science or Hotel and Catering Management or any other related programme
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credits in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and/or Biology and any of the following: Physics, Home Management, Clothing and Textile, Food and Nutrition, Agricultural Science, Garment Making, Cosmetology, Catering craft and Economics at WASC/SSCE/GCE 'O' level/NABTEB/NECO or its equivalent obtained at not more than two sittings
subjects: Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science and one (1) other subject.

title: HOME SCIENCE
de_requirements:
National Diploma and other acceptable Diploma holders with credit passes in Biology or Agricultural Science or Food and Nutrition or Catering or Garment Making or Home Management and Chemistry may be admitted into year one of degree programme.


Higher Diploma or NCE in Home Economics or any other related area with credit pass in Biology or Agricultural Science and Home Economics may be admitted into the second year programme
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes including English language, Chemistry, Mathematics/Physics, Biology/Agricultural Science/Food and Nutrition/Home Management/Catering/Garment Making.

General Metal Work,  General Wood Work, Building/Engineering Drawing, Furniture Design and Construction, Upholstery Design and Construction, Spray Painting and Period Furniture, Spinning, Weaving, Surface Design and Printing, Bleaching, Dyeing and Finishing and Basic Electricity.
subjects:
Chemistry, Biology or Agriculture and
Mathematics or Physics

title: HUMAN ANATOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics in addition to the UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: INDUSTRIAL TECHNICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)   ND lower credit in Civil Engineering, Production/Electrical Engineering.

(iii)    Final City and Guilds or its equivalent plus National Technical Certificate.
(iv) NCE credit  in Technical Education plus 'O' Level credit passes in Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English, Physics or Mathematics at GCE/SSCE, NTC, City & Guild intermediate
subjects: Mathematics and other two (2) from Science, Social Science, Trade subject: Technical Drawing, Woodwork, Metalwork, Basic Electricity, Building Construction.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
(A) 5-year Programme

        (i) HND,

        (ii) NCE/Other 3-year Diploma Programmes (2-year diploma programmes are not accepted),

        (iii) 3 A-level subjects obtained in not more than two sittings, and

        (iv) JUPEB


(B) 4-year Programme is for Degree holders ONLY admitted under Direct Entry Mode


All candidates must have relevant 'O' level certificates, i.e., credit pass in at least five (5) subjects which must include: English Language, Literature in English, Mathematics or any science subject approved by the University, obtained at a maximum of two sittings.
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics or any science subject approved by the University, obtained at a maximum of two sittings
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and any other two arts or social science subjects

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject plus the UTME requirements.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other relevant Arts/Sciences/Social Sciences subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: LINGUISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE to include any Language, preferably an African Language.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any Language and two (2) other subjects.

title: LINGUISTICS IGBO & OTHER AFRICAN LANGUAGES
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Igbo and one  (1) Arts/Social Sciences subject.

 

(ii) NCE in Igbo and one Arts subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Igbo, English Language and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Igbo and two (2) subjects from Arts and Social Sciences.

title: MARKETING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Accounting, Management, Government and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics plus one (1) other subject.

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts and Social Science subjects.

de_requirements:
) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

(ii)           NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics

title: NURSING/NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i)              'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics

(ii)            ND Upper Credit in Prosthesis and Orthopaedic Technology.

(i)              Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Biology/ Zoology, Chemistry and Physics plus  three (3) other 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and English Language.

(ii)            NRN or its approved equivalent plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes  in English Language and four (4) Science subjects chosen from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Human Anatomy, Physiology and Hygiene, Health Science, Further Mathematics and General Science.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: NUTRITION & DIETETICS

title: PHARMACY
de_requirements:
Three (3) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Botany/Zoology and Physics/Mathematics in addition to UTME requirements.

Candidates with relevant first degree having not less than Second Class Lower degree in addition to UTME requirements may be considered in line with the University of Nigeria admission policy.
utme_requirements: Five (5)  credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology at not more than two sittings in SSCE or WASSCE or its equivalent.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology.

title: PHILOSOPHY
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
subjects: Government and any other two (2) subjects

title: PHYSICAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Biology, Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

 

(ii)  NCE merit in Physical Education and credit in Arithmetical process or Mathematics.

 

(iii)  Diploma in Health Education, Environmental Sanitation, Physical Education, Social work, Health Administration with overall grades of merit plus three (3) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit which should include English Language.

 

(iv) NCE in Biology, Health Education, and Integrated Science with a pass grade plus two (2) 'O' Level credit passes/TC II merit passes.

 

(v)    Registered Nurse plus five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language.
utme_requirements:
i) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes including     English Language, Biology or its equivalent.

 

ii) Five (5) SSC credit passes/TC II merit passes to include English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) relevant subjects.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: NCE/Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject from Further Mathematics and Biology or Agricultural Science.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

utme_requirements: Five "O" Level Credit passes in English Language and the relevant subjects in the courses combined.
subjects: UTME subjects as applicable in the courses combined

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements: Graduates with at least a minimum of merit grade at the NCE, Diploma in Education, Music, Religion, Adult Education, Physical and Health Education, Social Science Education or Science Education are qualified to be admitted into a three-year degree programme
utme_requirements: Candidates who have satisfied the general university requirements for admission and who have passed any five teaching subjects at credit level in at least two sittings in SSSCE/WASCE/GCE or their equivalent are qualified to be admitted.
subjects:
Special Education (SPED)/History: History and any other two Arts Subjects

SPED/English: Literature in English and any other two Arts subjects

SPED/Social Studies: Social Studies and any other two Social Science subjects

SPED/Economics: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

SPED/Igbo: Igbo and any other two Arts subjects

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements: Graduates with at least a minimum of merit grade at the NCE, Diploma in Education, Music, Religion, Adult Education, Physical and Health Education, Social Science Education or Science Education are qualified to be admitted into a three-year degree programme
utme_requirements: Candidates who have satisfied the general university requirements for admission and who have passed any five teaching subjects at credit level in at least two sittings in SSSCE/WASCE/GCE or their equivalent are qualified to be admitted.
subjects:
Special Education (SPED)/History: History and any other two Arts Subjects

SPED/English: Literature in English and any other two Arts subjects

SPED/Social Studies: Social Studies and any other two Social Science subjects

SPED/Economics: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

SPED/Igbo: Igbo and any other two Arts subjects

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:

ND/HND upper credit in Town Planning or related programmes plus UTME requirements are accepted

title: VETERINARY MEDICINE
